nodes.text: The Qubey were a sentient species of alien native to the moon of Caliban. They were short creatures, and in terms of technology, were not very advanced. Their homeworld was disturbed during the Clone Wars, due to an invasion by Separatist forces led by General Grievous.

During the Battle of Caliban, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and several clone troopers of the 212th Attack Battalion were captured by General Grievous, and were ordered to rebuild a bridge destroyed by the invasion. The prisoners originally planned to sabotage the bridge, but changed their plans when they discovered a Qubey youngling that was separated due to the collapse of the bridge.

The Qubey on the other side of the chasm were able to get the prisoners attention, and formulated a plan. The Qubey distracted General Grievous by piling on top of him, allowing the clone troopers to gain advantage over the B1 battle droids and steal their E-5 blaster rifles. The Qubey then caused an avalanche, burying General Grievous and his forces. Obi-Wan and the clones then rushed to their gunship, and escaped, destroying the bridge on their way out.

The Qubey first appeared in the comic book Star Wars Adventures: The Clone Wars – Battle Tales 5, released on September 30, 2020. The flashback depicting Caliban and the Qubey was drawn by Philip Murphy.
